entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a way to delete seed made with HasData without removing data in the database #29273
  • JSON/Query: optimize casts to nvarchar(max) in json queries where possible #29267
    Backlog
  • Use custom converter results in duplicate resulting column names #29265
  • Confusing doc-comments on DeleteBehavior enum #29261
    Backlog
  • Sqlite: AddTicks translation gives incorrect results #29260
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Query/Sqlite: AddMonths and AddTicks translation may lead to small result discrepancies vs l2o #25851
    MQ
  • Recursive CTE call in FromSqlRaw always fails with InvalidOperationException (was called with non-composable SQL and with a query composing over it) #29266
  • Count() times out on IQueryable #29224
  • Excessive memory usage after enabling DbContextFactory #28988
    6.0.11
  • [6.0.x] Avoid re-sending PRAGMA KEY on pooled SQLite connections #28967
    6.0.11
  • Aggregate function on owned type fails in EF7 #29201
    7.0.0
  • No-Relational Provider - SaveChanges #29263
  • Owned Entity throws InvalidOperationException inside RelationalSqlTranslatingExpressionVisitor.TryRewriteEntityEquality #29142
    7.0.0
  • Table spitting sample in docs throws "Sequence contains no elements" from `SqlExpressionFactory` in EF7 #29196
    7.0.0
  • AddSqlServer should have an `optionsAction` that provide the `IServiceProvider` #29242
  • Regression in EF Core 7? Nullable DateTime to Non-nullable DateTime conversion bug when using SqlServer type DateTime instead of DateTime2 #29239

PullRequests

Created

  • [8.0] Fix to #29260 - Sqlite: AddTicks translation gives incorrect results #29274
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29272
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/6.0] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #29269
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode

Merged

  • [main] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and non-Svc pools #29271
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/7.0] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #29270
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [MQ] Add test changes to AddMonths test for Sqlite #29262
    auto-merge
  • [release/3.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #29268
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [release/2.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and Ubuntu 20.04 #29264
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29257
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29258
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Query: Allow final GroupBy navigation #29205
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • MQ: Specify facets and store types in Northwind model #29226
  • [release/6.0] Query: Use type mapping from IDbFunction while translating (#27995) #29216
